attributes.action: Petition a vote of no confidence in the current government and parliament.
attributes.additional_details: The current parliament has graphically demonstrated it's inability to lead the UK, been demonstrably expedient with the truth and have descended into personal infighting at a time when the population of the UK needs leading towards unity, by example. All confidence in the current parliament has been lost. It is with a heavy heart that we call for the dissolution of parliament and the opportunity for a new government to be selected through a general election.
attributes.background: We the people of the United Kingdom petition a vote of no confidence in the current UK Government and Parliament and ask that H.M. Queen Elizabeth dissolves the current government and parliament until such time as a capable one can be elected through a general election.
